channel.title: Demonik Server 1's exp rate - Server 2's exp rate
channel.description: Does anyone know how to get server 1 on demoniks source exp rate of 1x? :S I have server 2 exp rate at 60x, but for some reason server 1 still is at 1x :S i have to server folders, 1 and 2, the files are all same, except for the conff2p.xml in the server 1 folder obviously :S Anyone know how to fix this? Thanks guys. :)

item.title: Demonik Server 1's exp rate - Server 2's exp rate
item.dc:creator: @elyad elyad
item.description:
@elyad wrote:

Cheers guys I figured it now thought. Can close this topic!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Demonik Server 1's exp rate - Server 2's exp rate
item.dc:creator: @freaky5000 freaky5000
item.description:
@freaky5000 wrote:

I have just found out that, the exp rate works for both, it just determines which server is turned on at the time i.e If server 1 is turned on it will use the exp rate, if server 2 is turned on it will just use the exp rate for that aswell, but im not exactly sure how to have f2p exp rate lower than p2p if both servers are turned on at the same time, i’ll look a little bit more into it it’s probably not even that hard.

Other that i’d suggest running 2 completely different servers on different ip’s one for f2p and one for p2p.

dumm1s:

find the Doubler for non p2p.

I am guessing that would be in the player.java file?

Read full topic
